thread.title: Ervin
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Ervin

author: Ervin
title: Ervin
text: Just two days ago, I purchased a really nice sectional from them! Mrs. Kim was my salesperson and she was DYNAMIC! She never once rushed me into a sale and she actually seemed to care about me making such a large purchase. The only reason I can't give them a full five stars however is due to the fact that my couch had to be ordered since it was out of stock and they couldn't give me a date of arrival even though I've paid for it besides saying it'll be in MID MARCH and also because I was also considering purchasing the total set and I asked could the manager lower the cost a bit if I bought everything and before Mrs Kim could even fully ask the manager he automatically said no, but when another customer asked, he proudly did it for them which I felt was very unfair
